results.description: England's bowlers fail to impress as the two-day tour match against a New Zealand XI ends in a draw.
results.shortTitle: England labour to tour match draw
results.title: England in New Zealand: Bowlers fail to fire as tour match ends in draw

thumbnail.altText: England all-rounder Chris Woakes bowls during a tour match against a New Zealand XI

results.description: Australia batsman Marnus Labuschagne signs a new contract with Glamorgan after his starring role in the Ashes series against England.
results.title: Marnus Labuschagne: Glamorgan sign Australia batsman to two-year deal

results.description: Warwickshire coach Jim Troughton says they will be stronger after coming through an 'extraordinary' injury crisis in 2019.
results.title: Warwickshire: Jim Troughton proud of how Bears got over 'extraordinary' injury crisis

thumbnail.altText: England duo Ian Bell and Olly Stone, Liam Norwell and Ryan Sidebottom are all on course to start 2020 in full fitness

results.description: Worcestershire sign Australia international batsman Ashton Turner for their T20 Blast campaign in 2020.
results.shortTitle: Worcs sign Australia's Turner for T20
results.title: Ashton Turner: Worcestershire sign Australia batsman for T20 Blast

results.description: Former Sussex and England seamer James Kirtley is appointed full-time pace bowling coach by the county.
results.shortTitle: Kirtley named Sussex pace bowling coach
results.title: Sussex: James Kirtley named full-time pace bowling coach

results.description: Somerset appoint Stuart Barnes as a full-time bowling coach on a two-year contract.
results.title: Stuart Barnes given Somerset full-time bowling coach role

results.description: Live ball-by-ball radio commentary of New Zealand XI v England in their Test warm-up match at Cobham Oval, Whangarei.
results.shortTitle: Listen: New Zealand XI v England
results.title: Listen to live commentary from New Zealand XI v England

results.description: Kevin Shine joins Nottinghamshire as an assistant coach after 14 years as lead fast bowling coach at the ECB.
results.shortTitle: Shine joins Notts as assistant coach
results.title: Kevin Shine: Former England fast bowling coach joins Nottinghamshire as assistant

results.description: Dom Sibley and Zak Crawley boost their England Test hopes with centuries on the first day of a tour match against a New Zealand XI.
results.shortTitle: Sibley & Crawley hit tons in tour match
results.title: England in New Zealand: Dom Sibley and Zak Crawley hit centuries in tour match

results.description: Live ball-by-ball commentary from Australia as Perth Scorchers face Sydney Thunder in the Women's Big Bash League.
results.shortTitle: Listen: WBBL - Perth Scorchers beat Sydney Thunder
results.title: Listen to Perth Scorchers v Sydney Thunder in the Women's Big Bash League

thumbnail.altText: Nat Sciver of the Perth Scorchers

results.description: Nottinghamshire off-spinner Matthew Carter signs a new deal which keeps him at the club until the end of the 2021 season.
results.title: Matt Carter: Nottinghamshire spinner extends contract at Trent Bridge
